channel.title: PokemonCL
channel.description:
[center]I've been developing this game for a couple weeks, learning how to code while I make it. I've been doing my best with my limited coding skills.
This has %100 been coded completely by me starting from an empty php file.
This is a browser-based pokemon style rpg.
[i][b]Check it out here.[/b][/i] [url=http://pkmncl.com/]http://pkmncl.com/[/url]
[i][b]Things to do still.[/b][/i]
[b]-[/b] Code a battle script. ( so the game won't be based on maps. )
[b]-[/b] Make other types of minigames for users to play.
[b]-[/b] Improve my macro detection script.
[b]-[/b] Fix the private message system to alert you when you recieve a new message.
[b]-[/b] Learn better css, to improve the look of the overall game.
[b]-[/b] Add more maps.
[b]-[/b] go back through my code and improve it.
[b]-[/b] Add in support for multiple evolutions ( example.. Eevee )
[b]-[/b] Think of new ideas for the game.
[i][b]Things already done.[/b][/i]
[b]-[/b] Customarily made pokemon sprites.
[b]-[/b] Userbox
[b]-[/b] Message system
[b]-[/b] Players profile
[b]-[/b] pokemon evolution
[b]-[/b] Maps
[b]-[/b] Custom pokemon memory minigame
[b]-[/b] Stores
[b]-[/b] Ranks
[b]-[/b] online userlist
[b]-[/b] Forums (added but not done yet)
[b]-[/b] Trading pokemon ( works but isn't the greatest way. )
[b]A couple pictures.[/b]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/35ckb4j.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/r8h82h.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2z7lp4p.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/xc7qbp.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/99fnk3.png[/img]
The game might not look to great yet but we will get there :)
[/center]

item.title: PokemonCL
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

Lin:

If you want, the way the real games do Pokemon encounters is they actually have a set of entries for every single type of Pokemon to appear. Like if they wanted level 2 Rattatas to be common, they would add 4 Rattatas at level 2 to the list of encounters and then, say, 2 Pidgeys at level 3. A random number from 0-5 would be picked to decide what was encountered.

Thank’s Lin, I needed this information

Read full topic

item.title: PokemonCL
item.dc:creator: @nicks nicks
item.description:
@nicks wrote:

I’ve done a bunch of updates, I’ll post them here when I get the time.

Read full topic

item.title: PokemonCL
item.dc:creator: @nicks nicks
item.description:
@nicks wrote:

Well, this game isn’t really intended to relate much with the actual pokemon games.

But thanks for the advice

Read full topic

item.title: PokemonCL
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

If you want, the way the real games do Pokemon encounters is they actually have a set of entries for every single type of Pokemon to appear. Like if they wanted level 2 Rattatas to be common, they would add 4 Rattatas at level 2 to the list of encounters and then, say, 2 Pidgeys at level 3. A random number from 0-5 would be picked to decide what was encountered.

Read full topic

item.title: PokemonCL
item.dc:creator: @nicks nicks
item.description:
@nicks wrote:

Yes, it’s only me, but I do have some people testing. I say we as in the players/testers also XD

Recent updates

  • Re-did the level system, it’s now based on a much better formula than before.

  • Re-coded the way map pokemon appear. ( now I have the ability to make others appear more often than others. )

  • Added a spot on the template for your pokemon in slot 1 to appear so, you always know who is there.

  • Started with a new idea… adding pokemon eggs for each type of pokemon, and will be using them for a lot of new content.

  • Right now I’m working on the evolution system further.

Read full topic

item.title: PokemonCL
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Looking good so far! Now are you the only developer because at the top it says you are but at the bottom it says “we will get there”

Read full topic

item.title: PokemonCL
item.dc:creator: @nicks nicks
item.description:
@nicks wrote:

[center]I’ve been developing this game for a couple weeks, learning how to code while I make it. I’ve been doing my best with my limited coding skills.

This has %100 been coded completely by me starting from an empty php file.

This is a browser-based pokemon style rpg.

Check it out here.
http://pkmncl.com/

Things to do still.

- Code a battle script. ( so the game won’t be based on maps. )

- Make other types of minigames for users to play.

- Improve my macro detection script.

- Fix the private message system to alert you when you recieve a new message.

- Learn better css, to improve the look of the overall game.

- Add more maps.

- go back through my code and improve it.

- Add in support for multiple evolutions ( example… Eevee )

- Think of new ideas for the game.

Things already done.

- Customarily made pokemon sprites.

- Userbox

- Message system

- Players profile

- pokemon evolution

- Maps

- Custom pokemon memory minigame

- Stores

- Ranks

- online userlist

- Forums (added but not done yet)

- Trading pokemon ( works but isn’t the greatest way. )

A couple pictures.

r8h82h.png731×822

2z7lp4p.png732×602

xc7qbp.png732×577

99fnk3.png731×780

The game might not look to great yet but we will get there

[/center]

Read full topic
